content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=03/part-00000-tid-7369040652349253775-55a08cd7-e7e7-42bb-b933-15f17a65da9a-152-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result]'


SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    )
WITH (
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT
) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=03/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/month=03/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    result.filename() AS file_name,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2021/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    result.filepath() AS file_path,
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    COUNT(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
WHERE result.filepath(1) = 2020 AND
result.filepath(2) IN (01,02,03,04)
GROUP BY result.filepath(),result.filepath(1),result.filepath(2)
